languages.text: "Мне были преподаны тяжелые уроки. Когда Кунрад совершил переворот, я был{mf||а} тяжело ранен{mf||а}. Абеляр выходил меня, а с ним — и вся команда. Месяцы они заботились обо мне и протекторате, пока я был{mf||а} в забытьи. В мрачном и безрадостном сне, в котором я слышал{mf||а} только последние слова Теодоры: "Защити моих людей". Когда я очнул{mf|ся|ась}, то поклял{mf|ся|ась} исполнить это. Быть для людей не хозяином, но лидером, защитником".

"I have been taught some harsh lessons. When Kunrad staged the coup, I was badly wounded. Abelard nursed me back to health, and so did the entire crew. They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I only heard Theodora's last words: 'Protect my people.' When I awoke, I vowed to do exactly that. To be not a master to my people but their protector and their champion."
languages.original_text: "Мне были преподаны тяжелые уроки. Когда Кунрад совершил переворот, я был{mf||а} тяжело ранен{mf||а}. Абеляр выходил меня, а с ним — и вся команда. Месяцы они заботились обо мне и протекторате, пока я был{mf||а} в забытьи. В мрачном и безрадостном сне, в котором я слышал{mf||а} только последние слова Теодоры: "Защити моих людей". Когда я очнул{mf|ся|ась}, то поклял{mf|ся|ась} исполнить это. Быть для людей не хозяином, но лидером, защитником".

traits.locale_text: "I have been taught some harsh lessons. When Kunrad staged the coup, I was badly wounded. Abelard nursed me to health, and so did the entire crew. They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I heard only Theodora's last words, 'Protect my men.' When I awoke, I vowed to do exactly that. To be not a master to my people but a protector and their champion."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I only heard Theodora's last words: 'Protect my people.' traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: « J'ai appris certaines leçons à mes dépens. J'ai été grièvement {mf|blessé|blessée} lors du soulèvement de Kunrad. Abélard m'a {mf|soigné|soignée}, comme tout le reste de l'équipage. Ils ont veillé sur moi et le protectorat pendant des mois alors que j'étais {mf|plongé|plongée} dans les limbes d'un sommeil sans joie, où je n'entendais que les derniers mots de Théodora : "Protégez mon peuple." À mon réveil, c'est ce que j'ai juré de faire. Je ne serais pas le maître de mon peuple, mais {mf|son protecteur et champion|sa protectrice et championne}. »
languages.original_text: "I have been taught some harsh lessons. When Kunrad staged the coup, I was badly wounded. Abelard nursed me back to health, and so did the entire crew. They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I only heard Theodora's last words: 'Protect my people.' When I awoke, I vowed to do exactly that. To be not a master to my people but their protector and their champion."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai appris certaines leçons à mes dépens. J'ai été grièvement {mf|blessé|blessée} lors du soulèvement de Kunrad. Abélard m'a {mf|soigné|soignée}, comme tout le reste de l'équipage. Ils ont veillé sur moi et le protectorat pendant des mois alors que j'étais {mf|plongé|plongée} dans les limbes d'un sommeil sans joie, où je n'entendais que les derniers mots de Théodora : "Protégez mes hommes." À mon réveil, c'est ce que j'ai juré de faire. Je ne serais pas le maître de mon peuple, mais leur {mf|protecteur et champion|protectrice et championne}. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «He tenido que aprender mucho por las malas. Cuando Kunrad lanzó su ataque, quedé gravemente herid{mf|o|a}. Abelard cuidó de mí hasta que me recuperé, acompañado del resto de la tripulación. Cuidaron de mí y del protectorado durante los meses que pasé en el limbo, en un sueño oscuro y sombrío en el que solo oía las últimas palabras de Theodora: "Protege a mi gente". Cuando desperté, juré que eso era lo que haría. No sería señor{mf||a} de mi gente, sino su protector{mf||a} y su campe{mf|ón|ona}».
languages.original_text: "I have been taught some harsh lessons. When Kunrad staged the coup, I was badly wounded. Abelard nursed me back to health, and so did the entire crew. They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I only heard Theodora's last words: 'Protect my people.' When I awoke, I vowed to do exactly that. To be not a master to my people but their protector and their champion."

traits.locale_text: «He tenido que aprender mucho por las malas. Cuando Kunrad lanzó su ataque, quedé gravemente herid{mf|o|a}. Abelard cuidó de mí hasta que me recuperé, acompañado del resto de la tripulación. Cuidaron de mí y del protectorado durante los meses que pasé en el limbo, en un sueño oscuro y sombrío en el que solo oía las últimas palabras de Theodora: "Protege a mi gente". Cuando desperté, juré que eso era lo que haría. No sería señor{mf||a} de mi gente, sino su protector{mf||a} y su campe{mf|ón|ona}».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “因为我学到了严厉的教训。昆拉德造反的时候，我受了重伤。在阿贝拉德与全体船员的照顾下，我恢复了健康。在我不省人事的那几个月里，所有人都在努力守护我的王朝。在那一片黑暗之中，我只听到了西奥多拉说的最后一句话：‘保护好我的臣民’。醒来之后，我发誓，我一定要保护好每个人。我不要成为他们的统治者，我要成为他们的守护者，为他们而战。”
languages.original_text: "I have been taught some harsh lessons. When Kunrad staged the coup, I was badly wounded. Abelard nursed me back to health, and so did the entire crew. They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I only heard Theodora's last words: 'Protect my people.' When I awoke, I vowed to do exactly that. To be not a master to my people but their protector and their champion."

traits.locale_text: “因为我学到了严厉的教训。昆拉德造反的时候，我受了重伤。在阿贝拉德与全体船员的照顾下，我恢复了健康。在我不省人事的那几个月里，所有人都在努力守护我的王朝。在那一片黑暗之中，我只听到了西奥多拉说的最后一句话：‘保护好我的臣民’。醒来之后，我发誓，我一定要保护好每个人。我不要成为他们的统治者，我要成为他们的守护者，为他们而战。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「私は厳しい教えを受けた。クンラッドがクーデターを起こしたときに重傷を負ったのだ。アベラルドは私を回復させるために看病してくれた。私が無力な状態だった数カ月間、彼らは私と保護領の世話をしてくれた。暗く喜びのない眠りの中で聞こえたのは、シオドーラの最後の言葉だけだった。『部下を守ってくれ』という言葉を。目が覚めたとき、私は正しくそうすることを誓った。部下の主人になるではなく、部下の庇護者であり、部下の擁護者となることを誓ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "I have been taught some harsh lessons. When Kunrad staged the coup, I was badly wounded. Abelard nursed me back to health, and so did the entire crew. They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I only heard Theodora's last words: 'Protect my people.' When I awoke, I vowed to do exactly that. To be not a master to my people but their protector and their champion."

traits.locale_text: 「私は厳しい教えを受けた。クンラッドがクーデターを起こしたときに重傷を負ったのだ。アベラルドは私を回復させるために看病してくれた。私が無力な状態だった数カ月間、彼らは私と保護領の世話をしてくれた。暗く喜びのない眠りの中で聞こえたのは、シオドーラの最後の言葉だけだった。『部下を守ってくれ』という言葉を。目が覚めたとき、私は正しくそうすることを誓った。部下の主人になるではなく、部下の庇護者であり、部下の擁護者となることを誓ったのだ」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Ich habe einige harte Lektionen gelernt. Ich wurde bei Kunrads Coup schwer verwundet. Abelard hat mich wieder gesund gepflegt, gemeinsam mit der gesamten Crew. Sie haben sich monatelang um mich und das gesamte Protektorat gekümmert, während ich im Schwebezustand war, in einem dunklen und freudlosen Schlaf, in dem ich nur Theodoras letzte Worte hörte: 'Beschützt meine Leute.' Als ich schließlich erwachte, schwor ich, genau das zu tun. Kein Meister meines Volkes zu sein, sondern sein Beschützer, sein Streiter."
languages.original_text: "I have been taught some harsh lessons. When Kunrad staged the coup, I was badly wounded. Abelard nursed me back to health, and so did the entire crew. They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I only heard Theodora's last words: 'Protect my people.' When I awoke, I vowed to do exactly that. To be not a master to my people but their protector and their champion."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einige harte Lektionen gelernt. Ich wurde bei Kunrads Coup schwer verwundet. Abelard hat mich wieder gesund gepflegt, gemeinsam mit der gesamten Crew. Sie haben sich monatelang um mich und das gesamte Protektorat gekümmert, während ich im Schwebezustand war, in einem dunklen und freudlosen Schlaf, in dem ich nur Theodoras letzte Worte hörte: 'Beschützt meine Männer.' Als ich schließlich erwachte, schwor ich, genau das zu tun. Kein Meister meines Volkes zu sein, sondern sein Beschützer, sein Streiter."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Zor dersler aldım. Kunrad'ın darbesi sırasında fena yaralandım. Abelard ve tayfam, beni sağlığıma kavuşturmak için uğraştı. Ben sadece Theodora'nın son sözleri olan 'Halkımı koru.' cümlesini duyabildiğim, karanlık ve kederli bir uykudayken, araftayken bana ve protektorama aylarca baktılar. Uyandığımda bu cümleyi gerçekleştirmeye yemin ettim. Halkıma bir efendi değil, bir koruyucu ve onların müdafisi olacaktım."
languages.original_text: "I have been taught some harsh lessons. When Kunrad staged the coup, I was badly wounded. Abelard nursed me back to health, and so did the entire crew. They looked after me and the protectorate for months while I was in limbo, a dark and joyless sleep in which I only heard Theodora's last words: 'Protect my people.' When I awoke, I vowed to do exactly that. To be not a master to my people but their protector and their champion."
